Huafeng Coal Mine is an underground coal mine operated by Xinwen Mining Group Co., Ltd

operators: 新汶矿业集团有限责任公司华丰煤矿 (Xinwen Mining Group Co., Ltd.)

web_search_companies.notes: The mine has been in operation since 1959 and has undergone several capacity adjustments.
